Articles.Content:
These planes are very special because they are very similar, but one did not come to fruition. The F-20 Tigershark was cancelled because of costs and not fulfilling its goals. It was a highly advanced aircraft for its time, and now you can fly it in KSP!

Features:

High TWR approaching 2 for both

High maneuverability

Very good looking

Stock without weapons

Historically accurate weapon caliber

Takes off carefully, in a hair raising way

BE WARNED:

These planes tail strike easily. I would recommend pulling up very carefully at above 120 m/s or waiting until the end of the runway.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Folder with all 4(open it to choose one, or download the whole thing. Remove planes from folder, and put them where you want them):https://www./folder/rdx43kobxxk7m/F-20_and_F-5_Fighters

Edited September 14, 2015 by Alphasus
I am very sorry, I forgot that the F-20 has one engine. I will fix that immediately. Thank you.
